properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 4:09PM EST until January 9 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wintry mix of snow and freezing rain expected. Total snow
accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to
one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Delta and Southern Schoolcraft Counties.

* WHEN...From 1 PM to 10 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and hazardous travel,
especially during the evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If ice accumulations end up being more
robust, there could be additional concerns for minor tree
damage, mostly to branches, and some power outages.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 10 PM EST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED
